help.title: Less than 5 words example of the bug
help.tags: arr[String] Try your best to tag each bugs with key words like 'controller', 'css', 'no idea'. Anything that gives me more of an idea
help.priority: [Bool], let's keep it simple. Priority should be anything that gets in the way of significant testing, or doesn't work for the user.
help.platforms: Which platforms does it work on? Clarify and make sure you check all first.
